variants.Description in input context: c.1234A>G (p.K412G) identified in a cohort of ALS patients.

Readout description.Result Description: The transcript levels of *ANKRD11* were reduced slightly (approximately 10%) in cells harboring the c.1234A>G variant compared to controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each qPCR experiment.

Technical replicates.Description: Each qPCR run contains triplicate reactions.

Basic positive control.Description: Wildtype cDNA was used as a positive control for *ANKRD11*.

Basic negative control.Description: No cDNA template served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Transcript levels within the range observed in healthy controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Transcript levels significantly reduced compared to healthy controls.

Readout description.Result Description: The level of ANKRD11 protein was slightly reduced in cells harboring the c.1234A>G variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each Western blot experiment.

Technical replicates.Description: Each Western blot run contains triplicate images.

Basic positive control.Description: Wildtype cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein levels similar to those in healthy cells

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein levels significantly reduced compared to healthy cells

Readout description.Result Description: The viability of cells containing the c.1234A>G variant was slightly lower compared to control cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment run contains triplicate images.

Basic positive control.Description: Wildtype cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Viability within the range observed in healthy controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Viability significantly reduced compared to healthy controls.
